sentences.en: After the war, a convention was set up to frame a constitution.
sentences.cn: 战后，为制定宪法组织了一次会议。

sentences.en: All new fashion starts out as a reaction against existing convention.
sentences.cn: 所有新时尚都是从打破现有常规开始的。

sentences.en: At the recent convention a declaration was adopted.
sentences.cn: 在最近举行的大会上通过了一项宣言.

sentences.en: Birmingham's International Convention Centre is the venue for a three-day arts festival.
sentences.cn: 为期3天的艺术节在伯明翰的国际会议中心举办。

sentences.en: By convention the deputy leader was always a woman.
sentences.cn: 按惯例，这一领导职务的副职总是由女性担任。

sentences.en: Freed from the bonds of convention and the fear of what others may think, the mind responds with new solutions.
sentences.cn: 从传统的束缚中解脱出来，不再担心别人会有什么看法，顿时感到柳暗花明。

sentences.en: HKBU ( Hong Kong Baptist University ) was founded by the Baptist Convention of Hong Kong in 1956 as the Hong Kong Baptist College.
sentences.cn: 香港浸会大学前身为香港浸会学院,在一九五六年由香港浸信会联会创立.

sentences.en: Houston was chosen as the site for the convention.
sentences.cn: 休斯敦被选作大会的会址。

sentences.en: It's obviously important to get as much mileage out of the convention as possible.
sentences.cn: 很明显，从这项协议中获取尽可能多的利益十分重要。

sentences.en: Playing together teaches children social conventions such as sharing.
sentences.cn: 一起玩耍可教会儿童与人分享等社会常规。

sentences.en: The action is an open violation of the Vienna Convention.
sentences.cn: 该行为公然违背了《维也纳公约》。

sentences.cn: 该市新建的会议中心

sentences.en: The convention does not apply to us.
sentences.cn: 这条惯例对我们不适用。

sentences.en: The Convention of Peking in 1860 , which ended the hostilities, provided for its outright cession.
sentences.cn: 一八六零年, 战争结束, 订立《北京条约》,九龙半岛正式割让予英国.

sentences.en: The governor will keynote the convention.
sentences.cn: 州长将发表施政方针的演说.

sentences.en: The world of advertising is obviously less bound by convention than the world of banking.
sentences.cn: 显然，广告业比银行业更少受到惯例的束缚。

sentences.en: They defied the conventions of the time by living together without being married.
sentences.cn: 他们无视当时的社会习俗，未婚同居。

sentences.en: They met at an annual convention in New York.
sentences.cn: 他们在纽约年会上会面.
